title: Sound of Metal
writer: Darius Marder, Abraham Marder, Derek Cianfrance
actors: Riz Ahmed, Olivia Cooke, Paul Raci
plot: During a series of adrenaline-fueled gigs, itinerant punk-metal drummer Ruben begins to experience hearing loss. When a specialist tells him his condition will rapidly worsen, he thinks his music career - and with it his life - is...
